Literature.Title: Design of Heptad Repeat Amphiphiles Based on Database Filtering and Structure-Function Relationships to Combat Drug-Resistant Fungi and Biofilms
Literature.Author: Tan P, Lai Z, Jian Q, Shao C, Zhu Y, Li G, Shan A

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human erythrocytes:10% Hemolysis=>128 µM,Mouse primary corneal epithelial cells (MPCE):45% Cell death=128 µM
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=8µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=16µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=32µM),Escherichia coli UB1005(MIC=2µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=16µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa PAO1(MIC=16µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 29213(MIC=>64µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 43300(MIC=32µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=>64µM),Staphylococcus epidermidis ATCC 12228(MIC=>64µM),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhimurium ATCC 14028(MIC=32µM),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhimurium C77-31(MIC=64µM),Enterococcus faecalis ATCC 29212(MIC=>64µM),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Choleraesuis CVCC 503(MIC=8µM),Candida albicans CGMCC 2.2086(MIC=8µM),Candida albicans CGMCC 2.2086(MIC=16µM),Candida albicans CGMCC 2.2086(MIC=4µM),Candida albicans(MIC=4-8µM),Candida tropicalis CGMCC 2.1975(MIC=2µM),Candida parapsilosis CGMCC 2.3989(MIC=8µM)
